analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti;
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā idam dukkhanti yathābhūtam na pajānanti
ayam dukkha samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam na ppajānanti ayam dukkha nirodho ti yathābhūta
na ppajānanti ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati yathābhūtam na ppajānanti

original: na me te, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā
analyzed: na me te bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā samaṇesu vā samaṇa sammatāḥ brāhmaṇesu vā

original: brāhmaṇasammatā, na ca panete āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva
analyzed: brāhmaṇa sammatāḥ na ca pana ete āyasmanto sāmañña ttham vā brahmañña ttham vā diṭṭhā iva

original: dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
analyzed: dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti

original: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti;
analyzed: ye ca kho keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā idam dukkhanti yathābhūtam pajānanti
ayam dukkha samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānanti ayam dukkha nirodho iti yathābhūta
pajānanti ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati yathābhūtam pajānanti

original: te kho me, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu
analyzed: te kho me bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā samaṇesu ca iva samaṇa sammatāḥ brāhmaṇesu

original: ca brāhmaṇasammatā, te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme
analyzed: ca brāhmaṇa sammatā te ca pana āyasmanto sāmañña ttham ca brahmañña ttham ca diṭṭhe iva dhamme
sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
